enum: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha

allOf.title: Resource
allOf.description: Group of items providing information about a resource. Resources can be, for example, files or parts of them (e.g. datasets or study documents such as study protocols or questionnaires) or also studies or substudies.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Unique identifier of the resource used for identification within the NFDI4Health.

classification.title: Resource classification
classification.description: Group of items providing information about the classification of the resource within the predefined categories.

type.title: Type of the resource
type.input_help: You can register a study, a study protocol, a questionnaire, etc. Please only add follow-up questionnaires if baseline questionnaires have already been registered.

titles.title: Titles/names
titles.description: Group of items providing information about title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Title/name
text.description: Scientific unabbreviated title or name of the [RESOURCE].
text.input_help: Please provide at least one title/name of the [RESOURCE]. If the original title is not in English, please also provide an English translation of the original title.

language.title: Language of the title/name
language.description: Language in which the title/name is provided.

acronyms.title: Acronyms
acronyms.description: Group of items providing information about acronym(s) or alternative short title(s)/name(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Acronym
text.input_help: If no acronym exists, you can provide a short title, preferably up to 5 words, e.g. 'NAKO-COVID Questionnaire'.

language.title: Language of the acronym
language.description: Language in which the acronym is provided.

descriptions.title: Descriptions
descriptions.description: Group of items providing information about the description(s) of the [RESOURCE].

text.title: Description
text.description: Short plain text summary of the [RESOURCE].
text.input_help: Please provide a description in the original language of the [RESOURCE]. If the original language is not English, please also provide a full English translation of the description.

language.title: Language of the description
language.description: Language in which the description text is provided.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: Group of items providing information about keywords describing the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Keyword
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from SNOMED CT or MESH.

code.title: Code of the keyword
code.description: If known, the code of the keyword in the classification/vocabulary used.
code.input_help: If known, you can provide the code of the keyword in the classification/vocabulary used.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: Language(s) in which the [RESOURCE] is conducted/provided.

webpage.title: Web page
webpage.description: If existing, a link to the web page directly relevant to the [RESOURCE].

contributors.title: Contributors
contributors.description: Group of items providing information about person(s), group(s) of persons or institution(s)/organisation(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

nameType.title: Is it a personal or organisational contribution?
nameType.description: Indication whether the contribution was made by person(s) or organisation(s)/institution(s)/group(s).

email.title: Email address
email.description: Email address of the person, organisation, institution or group of persons.

phone.title: Phone number
phone.description: Phone number of the person, organisation, institution or group of persons.
phone.input_help: Please use the International ITU-T E.164-number structure for geographic areas.

affiliations.title: Organisations associated with the contributor
affiliations.description: Group of items providing further information about the organisation(s) associated with the contributor.

name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the organisation associated with the contributor.
name.input_help: If you have already entered the name of the organistion in the field 'Name of the organisation/institution/group', please repeat it here.

address.title: Address
address.description: Address of the organisation associated with the contributor.
address.input_help: Please preferably use the following address format: Street name and number [comma] post code [comma] city [comma] country.

webpage.title: Web page
webpage.description: Web page of the organisation associated with the contributor.

identifiers.title: Digital identifiers
identifiers.description: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the organisation associated with the contributor.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the organisation.
identifier.input_help: Preferably, provide an identifier from ROR (https://ror.org/search).

contains.errorMessage: At least one contributor of type "Creator/Author" is required
At least one contributor of type "Contact" is required

idsAlternative.title: Alternative identifiers
idsAlternative.description: Group of items providing information about identifiers (IDs) assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering systems, e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.

scheme.title: Type of the registry
scheme.description: Type/name of the system where the given [RESOURCE] is already registered.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Identifier assigned to the given [RESOURCE] by another registering system, e.g. by a registry of clinical trials or a data repository.
identifier.input_help: If the [RESOURCE] is registered in other systems (e.g. a registry of clinical trials or a data repository), you can provide here corresponding identifier(s) such as DRKS00021273, NCT04327505, etc.

ids.title: Related resources
ids.description: Group of items providing information about the resources related to the given [RESOURCE] and their identifiers (IDs), e.g. DOIs of publications, datasets, study documents or links to web pages.

identifier.title: Identifier of the related resource
identifier.description: Identifier related to, or associated with, the [RESOURCE] being registered. These can be identifiers of related publications, datasets, study documents, links to web pages, etc.
identifier.input_help: If existing, you can specify here an identifier of a related resource, e.g. a DOI of a publication, a dataset, a study document, a link to a web page, etc.

scheme.title: Type of the identifier
scheme.description: Type of the identifier of the related resource.
scheme.input_help: Select one value from the list.

relationType.title: Relationship between the resources
relationType.description: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
relationType.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: A is new version of B
A is previous version of B
A is variant form of B
A is original form of B

typeGeneral.title: Type of the related resource
typeGeneral.description: Type/form of the related resource, e.g. journal article, dataset, text, etc.
typeGeneral.input_help: Select one value from the list.

idsNfdi4health.title: Related resources registered on this portal
idsNfdi4health.description: Group of items providing information about related resources (e.g. studies, study documents, etc.) registered on this portal.

identifier.title: Identifier of the related resource
identifier.description: Identifier of the related resource assigned on this portal.

date.title: Date of identifier assignment
date.description: Date when the identifier of the related resource was assigned.

relationType.title: Relationship between the resources
relationType.description: Relationship between the [RESOURCE] being registered (A) and the related resource (B).
enum: A is new version of B
A is previous version of B
A is variant form of B
A is original form of B

provenance.title: Provenance aspects of data entry
provenance.description: Group of items providing information about provenance aspects of the data entry on this portal.

dataSource.title: Source of information
dataSource.description: Source of information about the [RESOURCE] and the way it was uploaded/collected.

verificationDate.title: Last verified on
verificationDate.description: Date on which the responsible party last verified the information about the [RESOURCE], even if no additional or updated information is being submitted.

verificationUser.title: Last verified by
verificationUser.description: User who last verified the information about the [RESOURCE].

firstSubmittedDate.title: First submitted on
firstSubmittedDate.description: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first submitted for publication.

firstSubmittedUser.title: First submitted by
firstSubmittedUser.description: User who first submitted the [RESOURCE] for publication.

firstPostedDate.title: First posted/published on
firstPostedDate.description: Date when the [RESOURCE] was first posted/published.

lastUpdateSubmittedDate.title: Last update submitted on
lastUpdateSubmittedDate.description: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was submitted for publication.

lastUpdateSubmittedUser.title: Last updated submitted by
lastUpdateSubmittedUser.description: User who submitted the last update of the [RESOURCE].

lastUpdatePostedDate.title: Last update posted/published on
lastUpdatePostedDate.description: Date when the last update of the [RESOURCE] was posted/published.

lastUpdatePostedUser.title: Last update posted/published by
lastUpdatePostedUser.description: User who posted/published the last update of the [RESOURCE].

resourceVersion.title: Version number
resourceVersion.description: Version number of the [RESOURCE] within this portal.

chronicDiseases.title: Chronic diseases included?
chronicDiseases.description: Indication whether the [RESOURCE] addresses chronic diseases.

typeGeneral.title: In what form is the [RESOURCE] available?
typeGeneral.description: Specific information about the form in which the [RESOURCE] is available.
typeGeneral.input_help: You can select 'Text' for most of the study documents, e.g. for questionnaires, informed consent forms, case report forms, etc.

nonStudyDetails.title: Further details
nonStudyDetails.description: Group of items providing further detailed information about the [RESOURCE]. It is applicable only to resource types other than a study, a substudy, a dataset, a registry, or a secondary data source.

version.title: Version
version.description: If applicable, the version number of the [RESOURCE].

format.title: Format
format.description: If applicable, the file format of the [RESOURCE] (e.g., XML, PDF, XLSX, etc.).

useRights.title: Use rights
useRights.description: Group of items providing information about the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

label.title: License
label.description: License defining the rights to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].
label.input_help: Select one value from the list. If 'Other' is selected, please provide an explanation of the (re-)use terms and conditions in the field 'Additional information about use rights'.
enum: CC BY-NC 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial 4.0 International)
CC BY-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International)
CC BY-NC-SA 4.0 (Creative Commons Attribution Non Commercial Share Alike 4.0 International)

description.title: Additional information about use rights
description.description: Any additional descriptive information explaining terms and conditions to (re-)use the [RESOURCE].

link.title: URL of the license
link.description: Link to a web page that contains detailed information about the selected license.

confirmations.title: Licensing confirmations
confirmations.description: Group of items applicable only if a Creative Commons (CC) license is selected.

authority.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it?
authority.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have authority to license it.

terms.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license?
terms.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] have read and understood the terms of the chosen license.

irrevocability.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons licensing is irrevocable?
irrevocability.description: Confirmation that the authors of the [RESOURCE] understand that Creative Commons (CC) licensing is not revocable.

supportByLicensing.title: Do you confirm that the authors of the [RESOURCE] allow NFDI4Health to license the document?
supportByLicensing.description: Confirmation that NFDI4Health is allowed to license the document, i.e. to add the license information such as a license button and a statement that your material is licensed under a Creative Commons license to the [RESOURCE].

organisational.title: Details about the contributing organisations/institutions/groups
organisational.description: Group of items providing information about organisation(s), institution(s) or group(s) of persons contributing to the [RESOURCE].

type.title: Contributor type
type.description: The type of role that an organization, institution, or group of persons fulfills as a contributor. For example, this could include being a sponsor of the study or a group of authors of the document.
type.input_help: Which role does the organisation, institution or group fulfill? Select one value from the list.

name.title: Name of the organisation/institution/group
name.description: Name of the contributing organisation, institution or group.
name.input_help: An organisational name can be used to denote an organisation, institution or research group.

fundingIds.title: Funding identifiers
fundingIds.description: Identifier(s) assigned by a funder to the [RESOURCE].
fundingIds.input_help: If available, you can enter funding identifiers.

personal.title: Details about the contributing persons
personal.description: Group of items providing information about person(s) contributing to the [RESOURCE].

type.title: Contributor type
type.description: The type of role that a person fulfills as a contributor. For example, this could include being a principal investigator of the study or an author of the document.
type.input_help: Which role does the person fulfill? Select one value from the list.

identifiers.title: Digital identifiers
identifiers.description: Group of items providing information about digital identifiers of the person.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Digital identifier according to a specific scheme that uniquely identifies the person.

design.title: Characteristics of the [RESOURCE]
design.description: Group of items relevant for studies, substudies, registries and/or secondary data sources, including details on targeted health conditions, study population, outcome measures, and study design.

conditions.title: Primary health conditions or diseases considered in the [RESOURCE]
conditions.description: Group of items providing information about primary health conditions or diseases considered in the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Health condition or disease
label.description: The disease, disorder, syndrome, illness, or injury that is being studied. Conditions may also include other health-related issues, such as lifespan, quality of life, and health risks.
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from terminologies such as SNOMED CT.

classification.title: Terminology/classification
classification.description: Terminology/classification used to specify the health condition or disease.
classification.input_help: If used, name of the terminology/classification.

code.title: Code of the health condition or disease
code.description: Code of the health condition or disease in the terminology/classification.
code.input_help: If known, you can provide the code from the terminology/classification used.

focus.title: Primary focus of the [RESOURCE]
focus.description: Group of items providing information about the focus of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).

label.title: Focus area
label.description: Focus area of the [RESOURCE] (e.g. medication, food, therapy, device, etc.).
label.input_help: Preferably, use terms from terminologies such as SNOMED CT.

classification.title: Terminology/classification
classification.description: Terminology/classification used for the focus area.
classification.input_help: If used, name of the terminology/classification.

code.title: Code of the focus area
code.description: Code of the focus area in the terminology/classification.
code.input_help: If known, you can provide the code from the terminology/classification used.

groupsOfDiseases.title: Groups of diseases or conditions
groupsOfDiseases.description: Group of items providing information about groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].

generally.title: Which groups of diseases or conditions were the data collected on?
generally.description: General groups of diseases or conditions on which the data were collected.
generally.input_help: Select all that apply. For more information about the ICD-10 codings of groups of diseases/conditions, visit the WHO's ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

enum: Diseases of the blood or blood-forming organs and certain disorders involving the immune mechanism (III)
Diseases of the eye and adnexa (VII)
Diseases of the ear or mastoid process (VIII)
Diseases of the skin and subcutaneous tissue (XII)
Diseases of the musculoskeletal system and connective tissue (XIII)
Certain conditions originating in the perinatal period (XVI)
Congenital malformations, deformations and chromosomal abnormalities (XVII)
Symptoms, signs and abnormal clinical and laboratory findings, not elsewhere classified (XVIII)
Injury, poisoning and certain other consequences of external causes (XIX)
External causes of morbidity or mortality (XX)
Factors influencing health status and contact with health services (XXI)

conditions.title: On which diseases or conditions were the data collected?
conditions.description: Diseases or conditions on which the data were collected in the [RESOURCE].
conditions.input_help: Select all that apply. Values are based on lower level ICD-10 codes. For more information visit the WHO's ICD-10 homepage: https://icd.who.int/en.

enum: Intestinal infection due to other Vibrio (1A01)

administrativeInformation.title: Administrative information
administrativeInformation.description: Group of items providing administrative information about the [RESOURCE].

ethicsCommitteeApproval.title: Status of the ethics committee approval
ethicsCommitteeApproval.description: Status of the request for approval from the (leading) ethics committee.
enum: Request for approval not yet submitted
Request for approval submitted, approval pending
Request for approval submitted, approval granted
Request for approval submitted, exempt granted
Request for approval submitted, approval denied
Study withdrawn prior to decision on approval

startDate.title: Start date
startDate.description: In case of a planned [RESOURCE], enter the intended start date. In case of an ongoing [RESOURCE], enter the actual start date.

endDate.title: End date
endDate.description: In case of a planned or ongoing [RESOURCE], enter the intended end date. In case of a completed [RESOURCE], enter the actual end date.

subject.title: Primary subject
subject.description: The primary subject addressed by the [RESOURCE], for example persons, animals or other subject types.
subject.input_help: Select one value from the list.

dataSource.title: Data sources of the [RESOURCE]
dataSource.description: Group of items providing information about data sources from which the data of the [RESOURCE] are generated or extracted.

general.title: Types of data sources
general.description: Different types of data sources from which the data of the [RESOURCE] are generated or extracted.

description.title: Additional information about data sources
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about the data sources of the [RESOURCE], for example indication of data sources not listed in the field 'Type(s) of data sources' or a more detailed description of the selected data sources.
description.input_help: You can indicate here other data sources not listed in the field 'Types of data sources' or provide a more detailed description of the selected data sources.

eligibilityCriteria.title: Eligibility criteria
eligibilityCriteria.description: Group of items providing information about eligibility criteria for participants.

ageMin.title: Eligibility criteria: Minimum age
ageMin.description: Group of items providing information about the minimum eligible age of participants.

number.title: Minimum eligible age
number.description: Numerical value of the minimum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].
number.input_help: If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

timeUnit.title: Unit of age
timeUnit.description: Unit of measurement used to describe the minimum eligible age.

ageMax.title: Eligibility criteria: Maximum age
ageMax.description: Group of items providing information about the maximum eligible age of participants.

number.title: Maximum eligible age
number.description: Numerical value of the maximum age of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].
number.input_help: If age is less than 1 year, please indicate a value in months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, or weeks of gestation.

timeUnit.title: Unit of age
timeUnit.description: Unit of measurement used to describe the maximum eligible age.

genders.title: Eligible gender
genders.description: Gender of potential participants eligible to participate in the [RESOURCE].
genders.input_help: Select all that apply. If no gender was explicitly excluded in the [RESOURCE], 'Male', 'Female', and 'Diverse' should be selected.

inclusionCriteria.title: Inclusion criteria
inclusionCriteria.description: Inclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE].
inclusionCriteria.example: - First inclusion criterion; - Second inclusion criterion;
inclusionCriteria.input_help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion, starting with '-' and finishing with ';'.

exclusionCriteria.title: Exclusion criteria
exclusionCriteria.description: Exclusion criteria for participation in the [RESOURCE].
exclusionCriteria.example: - First inclusion criterion; - Second inclusion criterion;
exclusionCriteria.input_help: If possible, use an enumerated or bulleted list for each criterion, starting with '-' and finishing with ';'.

population.title: Population of the [RESOURCE]
population.description: Group of items providing information about the population of the [RESOURCE].

coverage.title: Coverage
coverage.description: Specification of the recruitment area of the [RESOURCE].
coverage.input_help: Select one value from the list.

countries.title: Countries
countries.description: Country or countries where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

region.title: Regions and/or cities
region.description: If applicable, regions and/or cities within a country where the [RESOURCE] takes place.

description.title: Population description
description.description: Additional descriptive information providing more details about the population of the [RESOURCE].
description.input_help: Any information important for the given population can be specified here.

obtainedSampleSize.title: Obtained sample size
obtainedSampleSize.description: Obtained number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (for example obtained number of participants at all sites).

outcomes.title: Outcome measures
outcomes.description: Group of items providing information about outcome measures.

title.title: Name of the outcome measure
title.description: Name of the outcome measure. For non-interventional studies, this can be the name of specific measurements or observations used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.
title.input_help: For non-interventional studies, you can provide specific measurements or observations used to describe patterns of diseases or traits or associations with exposures, risk factors or treatment.

description.title: Description of the outcome measure
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given outcome.

timeFrame.title: Time point(s) of assessment
timeFrame.description: Description of the time point(s) at which the measurement for the outcome is assessed, for example the specific duration of time over which each participant is assessed.

comment.title: Additional information about the [RESOURCE]
comment.description: Any additional information about specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that could not be captured by other fields.
comment.input_help: You can provide here specific aspects of the [RESOURCE] that could not be captured by other fields.

assessments.title: Additional assessments and measurements
assessments.description: Any additional assessments/measurements included in the [RESOURCE].

dataSharingPlan.title: Data sharing
dataSharingPlan.description: Group of items providing information regarding the sharing of data by the [RESOURCE].

generally.title: Is it planned to share the data?
generally.description: Indication whether there is a plan to make data collected in the [RESOURCE] available. In case of a [RESOURCE] with patients or other individuals, this refers to individual participant data (IPD).
generally.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available
No, there is no plan to make data available
Undecided, it is not yet known if data will be made available

description.title: Additional information about data sharing
description.description: Additional descriptive information providing more details about data sharing, for example indication of which data in particular will be shared or why the data will not be shared or why it is not yet decided.
description.input_help: Please indicate here which data in particular will be shared, or the reasons why it will not be shared or it is not yet decided.

datashield.title: DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure available?
datashield.description: Indication whether the DataSHIELD/Opal infrastructure is available.

requestData.title: Link to data request application
requestData.description: If existing, a link to the web page where the data request form and/or information on data reuse can be found.

url.title: Web page with additional information about data sharing
url.description: If existing, a link to the web page where additional information about data sharing can be found.

recordLinkage.title: Record linkage possible?
recordLinkage.description: Indication if record linkage with other data sources is possible.

primaryDesign.title: Is the study design non-interventional or interventional?

studyType.title: Information on specific study design
studyType.description: Group of items providing information about the study design.

interventional.title: Interventional study model
interventional.description: The strategy for assigning interventions to participants.
interventional.input_help: Select all that apply. If 'Other' is selected, please specify the type of the [RESOURCE] in the field 'Additional information about the [RESOURCE]'.

nonInterventional.title: Non-interventional study model
nonInterventional.description: The primary strategy for participant identification and follow-up.
nonInterventional.input_help: Select all that apply. If 'Other' is selected, please specify the type of the [RESOURCE] in the field 'Additional information about the [RESOURCE]'.

mortalityData.title: Mortality data collected?
mortalityData.description: Indication whether mortality data are collected in the [RESOURCE].
enum: Yes, vital status only (cause of death missing)

status.title: Overall status
status.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing
Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume
Completed: Recruitment, data collection, and data quality management completed normally
Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing

statusWhenIntervention.title: Is the intervention ongoing or completed?
statusWhenIntervention.input_help: Select one value from the list.

enum: Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume

stageStopped.title: Stopping stage
stageStopped.description: Specification of the stage at which the [RESOURCE] was prematurely stopped.
stageStopped.input_help: Select one value from the list.
enum: Ongoing (I): Recruitment ongoing, but data collection not yet started
Ongoing (II): Recruitment and data collection ongoing
Ongoing (III): Recruitment completed, but data collection ongoing
Ongoing (IV): Recruitment and data collection completed, but data quality management ongoing
Suspended: Recruitment, data collection, or data quality management, halted, but potentially will resume
Terminated: Recruitment, data collection, data and quality management halted prematurely and will not resume

reasonStopped.title: Stopping reason
reasonStopped.description: Specification of the reasons why the [RESOURCE] was prematurely stopped, for example due to toxicity, closed due to lack of study progress, temporarily closed per study design.
reasonStopped.input_help: Specify the reason why the [RESOURCE] was prematurely stopped.

statusEnrollingByInvitation.title: Participants enrolled by invitation?
statusEnrollingByInvitation.description: Specification whether participants are selected from a predetermined population.

centers.title: Mono- or multicentric?
centers.description: Specification whether the data are collected at only one or at more than one study center.

centersNumber.title: Number of centers
centersNumber.description: Number of study centers involved in data collection.

dataProviders.title: One or more data providers?
dataProviders.description: Specification whether the [RESOURCE] involves only one or more than one data provider.

dataProvidersNumber.title: Number of data providers
dataProvidersNumber.description: Number of data providers involved in the [RESOURCE].

sampling.title: Sampling method
sampling.description: Group of items providing information about the applied sampling method.

method.title: Applied sampling method
method.description: Type of the sampling method applied for the selection of participants.
method.input_help: Select one value from the list.

probabilityMethod.title: Specific type of probability sampling
probabilityMethod.description: Specific type of the probability sampling method applied for the selection of participants.
probabilityMethod.input_help: If known, select one value from the list.

nonProbabilityMethod.title: Specific type of non-probability sampling
nonProbabilityMethod.description: Specific type of the non-probability sampling method applied for the selection of participants.
nonProbabilityMethod.input_help: If known, select one value from the list.

biosamples.title: Biosamples collected
biosamples.description: Specification of biosamples collected in the [RESOURCE].

imaging.title: Imaging data collected
imaging.description: Specification of imaging data collected in the [RESOURCE].

omics.title: Omics technologies used
omics.description: Specification of omics technologies applied in the [RESOURCE].

primaryPurpose.title: Primary purpose of the [RESOURCE]
primaryPurpose.description: Foremost for interventional studies, please specify the primary purpose why the study was conducted. For non-interventional studies, this field may be 'Not applicable' as multiple purposes may be defined as primary ones.
primaryPurpose.input_help: Specification of the main purpose of the [RESOURCE].

targetSampleSize.title: Target sample size
targetSampleSize.description: Intended number of observational units for the whole [RESOURCE] (for example intended number of participants at all sites).

hypotheses.title: Research questions/hypotheses
hypotheses.description: Statement of the research questions and/or hypotheses underlying the [RESOURCE].

arms.title: Arms of the study
arms.description: Group of items providing information about the arms of the study.

label.title: Name of the arm
label.description: Short name used to identify the arm.

type.title: Role of the arm
type.description: Role of the given arm in the [RESOURCE].
type.input_help: Select one value from the list.

description.title: Additional information about the arm
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given arm.

groups.title: Groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE]
groups.description: Group of items providing information about the groups/cohorts of the [RESOURCE].

label.title: Name of the group
label.description: Short name used to identify the group.

description.title: Additional information about the group
description.description: Additional descriptive information about the given group.

interventions.title: Interventions of the [RESOURCE]
interventions.description: Group of items providing information about the interventions of the [RESOURCE].

name.title: Name of the intervention
name.description: A short descriptive name of the intervention.
name.input_help: If the same intervention is associated with more than one arm, please provide the information once and use the field 'Name(s) of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention' to associate it with more than one arm.

type.title: Type of the intervention
type.description: General type of the given intervention.
enum: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)
Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

description.title: Additional information about the intervention
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given intervention.

armsLabel.title: Name(s) of the arm(s) associated with the given intervention
armsLabel.description: Name(s) of the arm(s) of the [RESOURCE] associated with the given intervention.

exposures.title: Exposures
exposures.description: Group of items providing information about the exposures of the [RESOURCE].

type.title: Type of the exposure
type.description: General type of the given exposure.
enum: Genetic (including gene transfer, stem cell and recombinant DNA)
Combination product (combining a drug and device, a biological product and device; a drug and biological product; or a drug, biological product, and device)

description.title: Additional information about the exposure
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about the given exposure.

name.title: Name of the exposure
name.description: A short descriptive name of the exposure.
name.input_help: If the same exposure is associated with more than one group, please provide the information once and use the field 'Name(s) of the group(s) associated with the given exposure' to associate it with more than one group.

groupsLabel.title: Name(s) of the group(s) associated with the given exposure
groupsLabel.description: Name(s) of the group(s) of the [RESOURCE] associated with the given exposure.

type.title: Type of the outcome measure
type.description: The type indicates the degree of importance of the outcome measure in the [RESOURCE].

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

supportingInformation.title: Supporting documents available in addition to the data
supportingInformation.description: Supporting information and documents which will be made available in addition to the data collected in the [RESOURCE].

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

timeFrame.title: When and for how long will the data be available?
timeFrame.description: Indication of the time period for which the data and, if applicable, supporting documents will be made available.

enum: Yes, there is a plan to make data available

accessCriteria.title: Criteria for data access
accessCriteria.description: Indication of the access criteria by which the data will be shared, including: a) with whom; b) for which types of analyses; and c) by what mechanism.
accessCriteria.input_help: Please provide here with whom, for which types of analyses and by what mechanism the data will be shared.

nonInterventional.title: Non-interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE]
nonInterventional.description: Group of items providing information about specific non-interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE].

targetFollowUpDuration.title: Target follow-up duration
targetFollowUpDuration.description: If applicable, anticipated time period over which each participant would be followed.

number.title: Target follow-up duration
number.description: Numerical value of the target follow-up duration.

timeUnit.title: Unit of time
timeUnit.description: Unit of measurement used to describe the follow-up duration.

frequency.title: Number of follow-ups conducted
frequency.description: The number of follow-ups conducted within the specified duration.

biospecimenRetention.title: Biosamples retained in a biorepository
biospecimenRetention.description: Indication whether samples of biomaterials from participants are retained in a biorepository.

timePerspectives.title: Temporal design
timePerspectives.description: Temporal design of the study, i.e. the observation period in relation to the time of participant enrollment.
timePerspectives.input_help: Is it a retrospective, prospective or cross-sectional study?

biospecimenDescription.title: Specific types of retained biosamples
biospecimenDescription.description: Additional information about retained biosamples, i.e. an indication of the specific types of retained biospecimens (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.).
biospecimenDescription.input_help: You can provide here specific types of retained biosamples (e.g. blood, serum, urine, etc.).

interventional.title: Interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE]
interventional.description: Group of items providing information about specific interventional aspects of the [RESOURCE].

phase.title: Numerical phase
phase.description: If applicable, numerical phase of the [RESOURCE].
phase.input_help: Select one value from the list.

masking.title: Masking of intervention(s) assignment
masking.description: Group of items providing information about the masking of intervention(s) assignment.

general.title: Masking implemented?
general.description: Indication whether a masking (or blinding) of intervention(s) assignment is implemented (i.e., whether someone is prevented from having knowledge of the interventions assigned to individual participants).

allocation.title: Type of allocation of participants to an arm
allocation.description: Type of allocation/assignment of individual participants of the [RESOURCE] to an arm.
allocation.input_help: Select one value from the list.

offLabelUse.title: Off-label use of a drug product
offLabelUse.description: Unapproved (off-label) use of a drug product.
offLabelUse.input_help: Select 'Yes' or 'No' only for a drug study and 'Not applicable' otherwise.

roles.title: Who is masked?
roles.description: If masking is implemented, the party(ies) who are masked.

description.title: Additional information about masking
description.description: If needed, additional descriptive information about masking (e.g. information about other parties who may be masked).
description.input_help: You can provide here additional information about masking, for example other parties who may be masked.
